mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM customer_phone_history WHERE TO_CHAR(sms_date,'yyyy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') AND phone_no = #{phone_no}
SELECT salt FROM (SELECT * FROM customer_phone_history WHERE phone_no=#{phone_no} AND sms_date + (INTERVAL '3' MINUTE) > sysdate ORDER BY sms_date DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_phone_history(no, phone_no, token, salt) VALUES (SEQ_CUSTOMER_PHONE_HISTORY.nextval, #{phone_no}, #{token}, #{salt})
